page.title: 10GARTMORE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The main building is over 100 years old and the most children it has had is 103. At the moment it has only 43. It has 3 teachers and 3 visiting teachers. The school has a kitchen, a G.P. room and mobile classrooms in the playground. In October we have a fancy dress party for{Halloween}and in March and May we go to{Recorder {Festivals.}In 1984 Primary 6 & 7 won a {singing competition}for singing two Scots songs. In June we have a{Sports {Day}with Kinlochard school. P6 & 7 have an{outing}to Fettercairn to meet their penfriends at their "twinned school", and P1-5 have an outing related to their class project work, for example, to the Museum of Transport, the Paisley Observatory or Forest parks.
